meanings.definition: The thin, pointed stick used to play a drum.
meanings.sent1: I tapped the drum with the drumstick.
meanings.sent2: The drummer used a drumstick to keep the beat.
meanings.sent3: The drumstick made the drum sing a rhythmic song.
meanings.sent4: The drumstick danced on the drum's surface, creating music.
meanings.sent5: The shiny drumstick gleamed under the stage lights.

meanings.definition: The lower joint of the leg of a fowl, especially a chicken.
meanings.sent1: I love eating the crispy skin on a chicken drumstick.
meanings.sent2: She savored every bite of the juicy drumstick.
meanings.sent3: The drumstick on my plate looked like a tiny tree branch.
meanings.sent4: The drumstick was the star of the dinner table, drawing everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the roasted drumstick filled the kitchen with warmth.
